questions.question: Which is the largest ocean in the world?
questions.explanation: The Pacific Ocean is the largest ocean in the world.

questions.question: What is the national animal of India?
questions.explanation: The Bengal Tiger is the national animal of India.

questions.question: Which Indian state was the first to implement the Panchayati Raj system?
questions.explanation: Rajasthan was the first state to implement the Panchayati Raj system in 1959.

questions.question: Which is the largest continent?
questions.explanation: Asia is the largest continent by area.

questions.question: Which is the smallest state in India by area?
questions.explanation: Goa is the smallest state in India by area.

questions.question: Which river is known as the 'Ganga of the South'?
questions.explanation: The Godavari is often referred to as the 'Ganga of the South'.

questions.question: Who was the first Prime Minister of India?
questions.explanation: Jawaharlal Nehru was the first Prime Minister of India.

questions.question: Which is the largest lake in India?
questions.explanation: Wular Lake is the largest lake in India.

questions.question: Which is the largest delta in India?
questions.explanation: The Ganga-Brahmaputra delta is the largest delta in India.

questions.question: What is the capital of India?
questions.explanation: Delhi is the capital of India.
